summary.span: 为关联控件定义设计时标记内的内容区域。

span.span: Defines a region of content within the design-time markup for the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象表示生成的设计时标记内的内容区域实现。The object represents a region of content within the design-time markup that is generated by a implementation. 控件开发人员可以使用在自定义设计器区域实现定义的关联控件的设计时标记内的不同区域，以便编辑和事件处理的区。A control developer uses designer regions in a custom implementation to define separate areas within the design-time markup for the associated control and to provide editing and event handling for the area. 可视设计器，如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，可以使用设计器区域，以显示在设计图面上的控件的不同区域，并将引发到控件设计器区域的用户事件。A visual designer, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], can use designer regions to display the separate areas of a control on the design surface and to raise user events for the region to the control designer. 设计器区域可以简化控件设计器实现，因为由设计器的基类和可视化设计器提供许多基于区域的功能。Designer regions can simplify a control designer implementation because many region-based features are provided by the base designer classes and the visual designer. 类提供的基本功能的设计器区域，如能够单击，选择，并突出显示在设计图面中的区域。The class provides the base functionality for designer regions, such as the ability to click, select, and highlight a region in the design surface. 使用中控件的设计器实现，若要定义区域，不需要编辑对象。Use a object in a control designer implementation to define a region that does not require editing. 使用派生中控件的设计器实现，若要在设计时定义与可编辑的内容区域的类。Use the derived class in a control designer implementation to define a region with editable content at design time. 使用派生在控件的设计器实现中定义的可编辑区域，表示在控件中的模板的类。Use the derived class in a control designer implementation to define an editable region that represents a template in a control. 若要支持在从派生类中的区域，重写方法并添加一个或多个初始化对象添加到集合。To support regions within a class that is derived from the , override the method and add one or more initialized objects to the collection. （可选） 你可以通过重写处理在设计图面上的区域中的鼠标单击方法。Optionally, you can handle mouse clicks in the regions on the design surface by overriding the method. 使用的属性对象确定区域的可视化设计器的显示方式。Use the properties of a object to determine how the region is displayed by the visual designer. 重写属性以指示在设计图面上的用户可以选择该区域。Override the property to indicate that the region can be selected by the user on the design surface. 使用属性以突出显示设计器区域在可视化设计器; 例如，你可以突出显示区域后用户已单击以将其选中。Use the property to highlight the designer region in the visual designer; for example, you can highlight a region after a user has clicked to select it. 使用和属性来存储或检索地区的相关的其他详细信息。Use the and properties to store or retrieve additional details about the region. 具体而言，可视设计器中使用属性来显示工具提示信息，当用户将鼠标指针移到设计器区域。In particular, the property is used by the visual designer to display ToolTip information when the user moves the mouse pointer over the designer region. 使用属性来访问的方法和属性的包含设计器区域的控件设计器对象。Use the property to access the methods and properties of the control designer object that contains the designer region.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在控件的设计器实现，使用属性来存储或检索的设计器区域的其他信息。Within a control designer implementation, use the property to store or retrieve additional information for the designer region. 例如，如果控件设计器实现支持从多个设计器区域中选择，你可以使用在控件设计器中存储每个区域的唯一索引的属性。For example, if the control designer implementation supports selecting from multiple designer regions, you can use the property in a control designer to store a unique index for each region. 然后，可以使用将传入的区域属性方法来存储当前所选区域的索引。You can then use the property for the region that is passed into the method to store the index for the currently selected region.
